channel.title: Machine Learning on Le Metro
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Le Metro

item.title: Nlp Learning with tutorial and code (part 1)
item.description: We follow a NLP tutorial with code today (this link) Getting Data We’re using “Disasters in Social Media” dataset which consists of tweet archive where Over 10,000 tweets culled with a variety of searches like “ablaze”, “quarantine”, and “pandemonium”, then noted whether the tweet referred to a disaster event (as opposed to a joke with the word or a movie review or something non-disastrous). The objective is to distinguish between tweets that signal disasters and “irrelevant” tweets.
